snippet.title: [Official trailer] After Death
snippet.description:
After Death is an Indy video game (16 bits retro style).
Release date : 2017 on PC
Steam Greenlight : http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=778620821
Official website : https://afterdeathgame.wordpress.com/
facebook : www.facebook.com/AfterDeathTheGame/
twitter : @AfterDeathGame
https://twitter.com/afterdeathgame
